scripts.vercel-build-python: echo '--- [vercel-build-python START] ---' && echo 'Initial CWD:' && pwd && echo 'Running pip install...' && python3.12 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && echo 'Running flask init-db (TARGETING api/word_database.db)...' && python3.12 -m flask --app api.index:app init-db && echo 'Listing api/ directory contents:' && ls -la api/ && echo '--- [vercel-build-python END] ---'
